name: @obsfx/trekker
description: A CLI-based issue tracker built for AI coding agents. Stores tasks, epics, and dependencies in a local SQLite database.

scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target bun --external commander --external drizzle-orm --external onnxruntime-node --external sqlite-vec --external better-sqlite3
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run build && npm publish --access public

author: Omercan Balandi <balandiomer@gmail.com>
